/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Cars of different makes and models are parked along the side of the road, hinting at the city's active lifestyle. Trees and streetlights punctuate the scene, adding elements of nature and illumination to the urban setting. The image is bathed in natural light, suggesting it was taken during the day.
